name: SpinTokens
description: SpinTokens provides a way to toggle tokens to be spinning at various rates. GMs can spin any tokens, while players are limited to the tokens they can control.## Commands```!spin-start [Seconds Per Cycle] [--help | [--ids | <token_id> | [<token_id> ...]]]```Starts all specified tokens spinning. Tokens are specified by selecting them, and optionally by specifying their token_ids using the --ids argument.* `Seconds Per Cycle` -- specifies how fast the tokens should spin. This is the number of seconds before the token spins around in one complete circle. A second hand would use the number 60, for example.* `--ids` -- specifies additional tokens to apply the spin to.* `--help` -- shows this help message.```!spin-stop [--help | [--ids | <token_id> | [<token_id> ...]]]```Stops all specified tokens from spinning. Tokens are specified by selecting them, and optionally by specifying their token_ids using the --ids argument.* `--ids` -- specifies additional tokens to apply the spin to.* `--help` -- shows this help message.
